<Text: Bibliothèque et Archives nationales du Québec (BAnQ, unofficially translated as National Library and Archives of Québec) is a Québec governmental organization who manages the legal deposit and national archives systems of the province as well as its national library, which is located in the Grande Bibliothèque in Montreal.>
Triplets:<Bibliothèque et Archives nationales du Québec
1: Bibliothèque et Archives nationales du Québec

--------------------
Text: Bibliothèque et Archives nationales du Québec:  It is born out of a merger between the Bibliothèque nationale du Québec (BNQ) and the Archives nationales du Québec, in 2006.
Triplets:<Bibliothèque et Archives nationales du Québec
